mapper.select: SELECT m.id AS memberId ,m.Email AS memberEmail ,m.Surname AS memberSurname ,m.LastName AS memberLastname ,m.BirthDate AS memberBDate ,m.RegisterDate AS memberRegDate ,m.Gender AS memberGender ,m.MemberTypeId AS memberMemberTypeId ,m.InstitutionId AS memberInstitutionId ,m.MembershipExpirationDate AS memberMembershipDate ,m.Country AS memberCountry ,m.City AS memberCity ,m.MajorId AS memberMajorId ,m.Grade AS memberGrade ,m.Password AS memberPw FROM members AS m;
